q: a Colin Powell return to government- POLITICO Live: Don't look for a Colin Powell return to government Former Secretary of State Colin Powell said Sunday he's not interested and hasn't discussed returning to government. I'm not looking for a position, Colin Powell said on CNN's" State of the Union," adding that he prefers to serve as an informal adviser to Barack Obama . blog comments Reader Comments( 1) VIDEO: Giffords leaves Tucson

of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said. In some cases, it can be an awkward transition, to go from being a lawmaker to an executive, and to go from the federal level to the state level. There's going to be that transition that might have a few hiccups to it, he said." But he's familiar with all the issues, he's an energetic campaigner, he's got solid conservative credentials, he knows how to raise money." Robert Dion said

Social Security supporters are adamant that the program will be repaid, just as the U.S. government repays others who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds. Its' an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government, said Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt."
